nodes.title: Fix scaladoc
nodes.bodyText: The scaladoc comments have been mostly copied from the current collections. They sometimes contains references to undefined variables.

nodes.title: Incorrect benchmarks charts
nodes.bodyText: The horizontal scale messes with zero:

nodes.title: Specialize for small number of elements
Check that concat is properly overriden for performance
nodes.bodyText: concat was one of the first methods introduced in the strawman. We didn’t carefully check that it is actually overriden when it can be more efficient (e.g. in StrictOptimizedIterableOps).

nodes.title: Add TrieMap collection type
nodes.bodyText: We should adapt the code of the current collection’s TrieMap to the strawman design.
